datasets.name: countries
datasets.description: Information about different countries, images of their flags, and MP3 of their anthem
datasets.columns: Country,Code,Flag Image URL,Population,GDP Per Person,Continent,Region,Latitude,Longitude,Capital,National Anthem MP3

datasets.name: dogs
datasets.description: Different breeds of dogs, including images and rankings on different qualities like size and friendliness
datasets.columns: Name,Size,Kid Friendly,Dog Friendly,Low Shedding,Easy to Groom,High Energy,Good Health,Low Barking,Intelligence,Easy to Train,Tolerates Hot,Tolerates Cold,Image URL

datasets.name: spotify
datasets.description: The top 20 songs in many regions of the world, including 30 second MP3 links to most songs
datasets.columns: Track Name,Artist,Streams,Song URL,Album Image,Preview MP3,Position,Region,Country Code

datasets.name: tate
datasets.description: A selection of artwork from the Tate Museum. Includes title, artist, artist birth location, creation year, and a thumbnail of the artwork.

datasets.name: weather
datasets.description: Daily weather forecasts for the next five days for a selection of US cities.

datasets.name: words
datasets.description: The 1000 most commonly used English words and their parts of speech
